name: Collection 3 - We Blink So Humanely
description:
Collection themed around eyes and their inherent expression; 4 poems + 3 photographs on 8.5x11 full page glossy matte paper. Perfect for decorating, coordinating, or just reading.

Poems were handwritten by Marina then scanned; photographs all use manual settings. For comparable work by us, visit wordstocapture.tumblr.com
